alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 3:55PM EDT until August 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PISCATAQUIS...SOUTHEASTERN AROOSTOOK AND NORTH CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shin Pond to Patten to 8 miles north of East Millinocket, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Patten, East Millinocket, Medway, Sherman, Island Falls, Smyrna, Mount Chase, Sherman Station, Shin Pond, Smyrna Mills, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Dudley Township, Reed Plantation, Oakfield, Stacyville, Merrill, Crystal, Dyer Brook and Hersey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
